tasks.label: Deep Clean and Rebuild
args: Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .gradle, build, app/build 2>$null; flutter clean; flutter pub get

tasks.label: Clean Gradle
args: Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .gradle -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force app/build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
